sources.title: Dante's View (1998) Sheryl Lee, Guinevere Turner | Crime, Thriller | Full Length Movie
sources.description:
A beautiful killer on the run. An innocent girl in the middle of nowhere. No boundaries!  In a botched robbery, Samantha grabs stolen jewels and leaves her dying boyfriend at the scene. When her truck breaks down in Death Valley, she befriends June, an innocent girl who dreams of escaping her dead-end life.

Director: Steven A. Adelson
Writer: Liane Bonin
Stars: Guinevere Turner, Sheryl Lee, Brett Harrelson
Genres: Crime, Drama, Thriller

This video is also available in French.

00:00 Full Movie
00:49 A series of events unfold, including a robbery, a broken down truck, and a chance encounter in Death Valley.
09:49 A woman travels around the country, fixing a truck and exploring the desert with a friend.
18:26 A dramatic story unfolds involving a criminal offense, a shooting, and a musical performance.
25:36 A conversation about a woman's singing and a potential job offer turns tense and threatening.
34:16 A woman confesses to being an accomplice to a murder and forms a new connection with another woman.
42:02 A dramatic story of love, crime, and spontaneity unfolds as two characters consider leaving their small town for a life of adventure.
55:17 A mystery unfolds as a group of individuals deal with stolen baseball cards and suspicious behavior.
1:06:57 A dramatic and intense situation unfolds as two individuals grapple with betrayal, money, and trust, ultimately leading to a standoff with a gun.
1:17:37 A story of betrayal and learning to embrace life after a friendship ends.

@CultCinemaClassics

metadata.Plot: In a botched robbery, Samantha grabs stolen jewels and leaves her dying boyfriend at the scene. When her truck breaks down in Death Valley, she meets June, an innocent girl who dreams of escaping her dead-end life. A special relationship forms when Samantha seduces June with her free spirit and life without boundaries. Soon Samantha's dark side surfaces, threatening to destroy their lives forever.
metadata.Actors: Guinevere Turner, Sheryl Lee, Brett Harrelson
